V05n750:731: idamatra punaḥ pratikṣiptaṃ abhyanujñātaṃ ceti anuprajñaptiḥ |
V05n750:734: atyantamidaṃ na kartavyamiti hi vidhānaṃ pratikṣepaḥ |

V05n750:743: ātnarāyika-anāntarāyika-abhijñatvaṃ ca ākhyāpitā ca anuśāsakatvaṃ ceti vigrahaḥ |
V05n750:746: tayoḥ abhijña-tvaṃ vinaye sthitārthatvasya etad-dvayaṃ udbhāvakam |

V05n750:1004: ityasya lakṣaṇamāha-jānato akṛtatāṃ vidheḥ upasaṃpado aprarūḍhatāṃ vā dvitīyāyāṃ saṃghena sārdhaṃ karmaṇaḥ pratyanubhūtatāyāṃ tattvam |

V05n750:1024: yena tu sakṛtpoṣadhaḥ anubhūto bhavati ayaṃ pravrājayitavya upasaṃpādayitavyaśceti,
V05n750:1027: yuktiḥ punaḥ yasmādatra prathamaṃ pravartamānaḥ sāśaṃko bhavati,

V05n750:1090: khañjaḥ kāṇḍarikaḥ kāṇaḥ kuṇiḥ kubjo'tha vāmanaḥ |

V05n750:1112: pīṭhasarpi iti ādhārārthaṃ hastadvayaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya caturūpeṇa sarpati |
V05n750:1117: tathaiva akṣamabhāradhāraṇāt mārgagamanātiśayatvāt ca yathānukrameṇa bhāracchinnā mārgacchinnāśca ||
V05n750:1120: kecidevaṃ vadanti-ye niruddhakramaṇena hatagranthitvāt gamanāvarodhena iva parikramākāriṇaḥ,
V05n750:1121: ye ca yuvānaḥ karṣāntarvyāṃdhyādibhiḥ tathaiva asamarthitāḥ aparyantāḥ,
V05n750:1131: upasaṃpādakairapi rājabhaṭaḥ rājñā'nanujñātaḥ adūradeśikaḥ na pravrājayitavyaḥ upasaṃpādayitavyaśca iti ||

V05n750:2862: tasmāt yena nimittena āpattyadarśanādinā-utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karmakṛtaṃ bhavati,
V05n750:2880: samādātra antarāyikasya 'asti me'ntarāyikam' iti pratijñāne saṃvarasya dāne duṣkṛtamāṭrakaṃ,
V05n750:2882: nidāneṣvatra granthaḥ-“antarāyikaiḥ tāvat bhadanta dharmaiḥ samanvāgatam,
V05n750:2895: asya puruṣasya anukṛtitvasya hastacchinnāḥ pādacchinnā ityādinā ākṣiptatvam,
V05n750:2900: bhikṣavastu upasaṃpādakāḥ āpadyante duṣkṛtāmiti“ pāpalakṣaṇe granthaḥ ||
V05n750:2905: saṃsthāna-pramāṇa-daśābhedo manuṣyāṇāṃ yatra dvīpe tanmātravyudāśasavaraṃ atra dvīpagrahaṇaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate |
V05n750:2907: evaṃ ca ekadvīpakānāmapi eṣa mukha-karṇaprāvaraṇādīnāṃ pratikṣiptatvaṃ veditavyam ||
V05n750:2918: gulmakeśo yasya vidūṣakasya ivā'ntarāgulmena avasthitāḥ keśāḥ |
V05n750:2920: antaḥ kubjo bahīḥ kubjaḥ antarbahiḥ kubja iti,
V05n750:2942: apāṅgasamīpavarti yo akṣyavayavaḥ sa yasya nāsāsamīpe,
V05n750:2948: galitapakṣmaromatvāt vigaladraktamāsavat akṣṇaḥ paryanto yasya asau kaśmīlitākṣaḥ |
V05n750:2949: akṣākṣaḥ iti akṣayoḥ akṣiṇī yasya asau akṣākṣaḥ |
V05n750:2950: akṣiśāla-śantra dardru-vicarcikā iti akṣiśabdasya pratyekaṃ nipātaḥ |
V05n750:2961: aṇḍalāṅgulapraticchanna iti aṇḍābhyāṃ lāṅgūlaḥ praticchannaḥ asya iti aṇḍalāṅgūlapraticchanna iti aṇḍābhyāṃ lāṅgūlaḥ praticchannaḥ asya iti aṇḍalāṅgūlapraticchanaḥ ||
V05n750:2963: mūḍha ityanena upasaṃpadaṃ na jānātītyasya saṃgṛhītatvam ||
V05n750:2965: mūkavadhira iti mūkagraḥaṇena satyāṃ jihvāyāṃ vaktumasamarthaḥ jihvāhīnaḥ,
V05n750:2967: [ekahastapādaḥ iti ekaśabdasya] hastapādaśabdayoḥ pratyekaṃ saṃbandhaḥ- ekahastaḥ,
V05n750:2981: 'sarvanīlaḥ sarvapītaḥ sarvalohitaḥ sarvāvadāta' iti etadapi yatpaṭhyate,
V05n750:2989: sarveṇa sarvaṃ yadbhūyasā yasya vā abhiprāṇātipātapravarttā |
V05n750:2997: asatyapi janakatve mātāpitṛparigraheṇa avasthitayoḥ anujñāne saptāhadhāraṇe saṃghe ca ārocane [mātā-] pitṛtvaṃ,
V05n750:3004: evaṃ dhītikṛtikā yasya dhītitvaṃ upagatikā“-ityatra granthaḥ ||
V05n750:3020: yad māṭṛghātakādeḥ pravrājanaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ tatra ānantaryakṛtvaṃ tattu pratipattavyam |
V05n750:3021: ānantaryakārī na pravrājyaḥ ityevaṃ puna stad |
V05n750:3022: na sarvamātṛghāṭako na pravrājya ityevaṃ ca |
V05n750:3025: kasmin bhikṣuṇyāṃ kṛte bhikṣuṇīdūṣakatvaṃ jātaṃ bhavati,
V05n750:3039: no tu sahite pratiyogisvādanena dūṣakatvasya utthānam,
V05n750:3040: ityasya na hi anya-pradoṣeṇa anyasya saṃbaṃdhaḥ,
V05n750:3047: tadavasthayoḥ nā'pyanayoḥ dūṣaṇe dūṣakatva mityatra āha- aparājitatve |
V05n750:3055: nipātane vā āmarṣaṇe vā aparājitatvaṃ bhikṣuṇyā iti hi etad adūṣakatva-vijñānam |
V05n750:3064: (644) arhatvaṃ pravrajyopasaṃpadoḥ upagatau puṃstvasya hīnāyāṃ yoṣiti ||
V05n750:3065: śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya hīnāyāṃ vṛttāyāṃ striyāṃ vyaṃjanaparivṛttyā puṃstvogatau arhatvaṃ pravrajyopasaṃpadoḥ |
V05n750:3070: poṣadhavastu atra granthaḥ-“yaduktaṃ bhagavatā bhikṣuṇī bhiḥ bhikṣūṇāmantike bhikṣuṇībhāvaḥ paryeṣitavyaḥ iti katamesāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ āvāsika-naivāsikānāṃ, upālin“, iti |
V05n750:3071: tatsthānagatā vāsasthaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ upaniśritya bhikṣuṇīnāṃ vāsaḥ |
V05n750:3073: na ca niśrayātikramo yuktaḥ ityetad vijñānam |
V05n750:3077: gṛhyamāṇe saṃvare tasya saṃvarasya yadbhavatvaṃ tasya tadavasthasya utsṛṣṭau pratyākhyānādinā utsarge dhvaṃso bhavati |
V05n750:3079: na ca āneghasya pratyudāvṛttiḥ laṅghanādau dṛśyate |
V05n750:3080: tasmāt, na bhavatyasyā'jāyamānatve saṃvarasya pratyudāvṛttiḥ iti yo manyeta tannābhinivṛttyartha etatsūtram |
